item.title: Allu Arjun Meets Chiranjeevi After Walking Out Of Jail In Fan's Death Case | Photo - News18
item.description:
Allu Arjun Meets Chiranjeevi After Walking Out Of Jail In Fan's Death Case | Photo

Date: December 15, 2024
Source: News18

A day after Allu Arjun walked out of jail, he visited veteran star Chiranjeevi. Allu was welcomed by family members after a controversial arrest linked to a tragic death during the screening of his movie.

  • Allu Arjun was arrested on December 13, 2024, after a stampede occurred during the screening of "Pushpa 2: The Rule" at Sandhya Theatre.
  • The incident led to the death of a 35-year-old woman and serious injuries to her 9-year-old son.
  • Allu Arjun was granted a 4-week interim bail following his judicial custody.
  • Upon release, he expressed remorse for the incident and extended his support to the victim's family.
  • "Pushpa 2: The Rule" has received overwhelming success, crossing Rs 1000 crore at the box office.
“This incident was very unfortunate, we are extremely sorry whatever happened, we are with the family." – Allu Arjun

The visit to Chiranjeevi marks a moment of family support amidst the ongoing controversy surrounding Allu Arjun, who remains committed to helping the affected family as he navigates the aftermath of the tragic event.

item.title: Companies News Today Live Updates on December 15, 2024: ITC Foods targets growth in north and west India amid shift to branded products | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Companies News Today Live Updates on December 15, 2024: ITC Foods targets growth in north and west India amid shift to branded products

Date: December 15, 2024

Source: LiveMint

ITC Foods is focusing on expanding its market presence in northern and western India while transitioning towards branded products. The company is also exploring potential acquisitions to enhance its brand portfolio.

  • ITC Foods plans to increase its market share in the fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG) sector, specifically in staples, snacks, health foods, dairy, and beverages.
  • The company is hinting at possible acquisition deals to strengthen its growth strategy.
"Stay ahead of the curve with the latest insights from the corporate world through our company news coverage," highlighting the dynamic landscape of business and market shifts.

The article emphasizes ITC Foods' strategic intent to adapt to market changes and enhance its brand offerings amid a competitive landscape in the FMCG sector.

item.title: 5 Majestic Pictures Of Space Captured By NASA - Times Now
item.description:
5 Majestic Pictures Of Space Captured By NASA

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024 Source: Times Now

This article presents a stunning collection of five captivating images of space captured by NASA, showcasing various celestial phenomena.

  • NGC 3603: A brilliant cluster of young stars resembling a dazzling fireworks display, surrounded by interstellar gas and dust.
  • Eta Carinae: A massive star on the verge of explosion which could occur anytime from now to a million years, making it a candidate for a spectacular supernova.
  • Helix Nebula: An intricate image combining details from the Hubble Space Telescope and Kitt Peak National Observatory.
  • Starburst Galaxy NGC 1569: This galaxy has been producing stars at a rate 100 times faster than our Milky Way for the past 100 million years.
  • Carina Nebula: Revealed by the James Webb Space Telescope, showcasing hidden stellar nurseries that were previously obscured.
"The galaxy NGC 1569 gleams with the light of millions of young, newly formed stars." - Times Now

The images highlight the incredible beauty and complexity of the universe, showcasing NASA's advancements in space observation and photography. Each image offers a glimpse of the enchanting and vast cosmos beyond our planet.

item.title: We just got a hint that we might have to pay more for the iPhone 17 - TechRadar
item.description:
We just got a hint that we might have to pay more for the iPhone 17

Publication Date: October 2023
Source: TechRadar

  • iPhone 17 price increases are expected
  • As yet we haven't seen many price leaks
  • A new model is expected to appear in 2025

It’s anticipated that the iPhone 17 will be released in September 2025, with predictions of higher prices compared to the iPhone 16.

  • Analyst Jong Wook Lee suggests iPhone prices will increase due to previous years' profit margin declines.
  • The current iPhone 16 starts at $799, but the iPhone 17 is expected to cost more.
  • The rumored iPhone 17 Air could have a starting price of around $1,299.
“Although there were initial expectations that Apple’s iPhone prices would rise this year, prices were unusually not increased. As a result, profit margins have declined since...” - Jong Wook Lee

The iPhone 16 currently starts at $799, but consumers may need to prepare for a price hike with the impending iPhone 17 launch.

item.title: 39 Maharashtra Ministers Join Devendra Fadnavis' Cabinet. Full List - NDTV
item.description:
39 Maharashtra Ministers Join Devendra Fadnavis' Cabinet. Full List

Publication Date: December 15, 2024

Source: NDTV

The much-awaited cabinet expansion of the new Maharashtra government led by Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis happened today, with 39 ministers taking oath.

  • A total of 39 ministers inducted into the Maharashtra cabinet.
  • 19 ministers from the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP).
  • 9 ministers from the Ajit Pawar-led Nationalist Congress Party (NCP).
  • 11 ministers from the Eknath Shinde-led Shiv Sena.
“This expansion marks a significant step forward for the governance of Maharashtra," said Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis.

The cabinet expansion highlights the collaborative efforts between multiple parties to strengthen governance in Maharashtra.

item.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hai Actress Saumya Tandon Reveals Life-Changing Benefits Of Quitting Sugar: Shares A Healthy Sweet Potato Halwa Recipe - Zee News
item.description:
Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hai Actress Saumya Tandon Reveals Life-Changing Benefits Of Quitting Sugar: Shares A Healthy Sweet Potato Halwa Recipe

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Zee News

Actor Saumya Tandon shares her health journey after quitting sugar, highlighting the benefits and providing a healthy sweet potato halwa recipe.

  • Saumya Tandon removed sugar, jaggery, honey, and artificial sweeteners from her diet four years ago.
  • She credits this decision for significantly improving her life and health.
  • The actor encourages others to try sugar-free desserts, sharing her recipe for sweet potato halwa.
  • Health benefits of quitting sugar include weight loss, improved blood sugar control, and enhanced energy.
  • Recommendations for transitioning to a sugar-free diet include incorporating fruits and choosing whole foods.
“I gave up sugar, all sugar substitutes, honey, and jaggery four years ago. It’s a game-changer. Try it!” - Saumya Tandon

By reducing sugar intake, individuals can unlock numerous health benefits and enjoy sweet treats in a healthier way.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection day 11 early report: Allu Arjun film nears Rs 900 crore mark in India, eyes Baahubali 2’s record - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 box office collection day 11 early report: Allu Arjun film nears Rs 900 crore mark in India, eyes Baahubali 2’s record

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: Indian Express

Pushpa 2 has been breaking box office records with significant earnings since its release, showing resilience even amid controversies surrounding its lead actor.

  • The film saw a remarkable 73% surge in collections on Saturday, with expectations for a similar increase on Sunday.
  • As of Sunday evening, Pushpa 2 raked in Rs 57.22 crore, with projections of Rs 60-65 crore for the Hindi version alone.
  • The total worldwide collection is reported at Rs 1,196 crore, with domestic collections at Rs 866.5 crore.
  • The film aims to surpass the domestic record held by Baahubali 2 at Rs 1,030.42 crore.
  • Despite controversies related to Allu Arjun's arrest after a tragic incident, he has received strong support from industry colleagues.
"Pushpa 2 has earned Rs 1,196 crore worldwide, with its domestic collections standing at Rs 866.5 crore."

The success of Pushpa 2 continues to be a significant topic in the film industry, showcasing strong audience support despite challenges faced by its lead actor.

item.title: India vs Australia LIVE Cricket Score, 3rd Test Day 2: AUS 405/7 vs IND at Stumps in Brisbane - The Indian Express
item.description:
India vs Australia Highlights, 3rd Test Day 2: AUS 405/7 vs IND at Stumps in Brisbane

Publication Date: December 14, 2024

Source: Indian Express

Australia dominated Day 2 of the Test match against India, reaching 405/7 at stumps, bolstered by strong performances from Steven Smith and Travis Head.

  • Jasprit Bumrah was a standout for India, claiming five wickets.
  • India opted to bowl first after winning the toss, but rain limited play to just 13.4 overs on Day 1.
  • The series is currently tied at 1-1, with India winning the first Test and Australia winning the second.
  • Ravindra Jadeja's inclusion in the playing XI was a significant talking point leading into the Test.
"The Gabba pitch is expected to offer assistance to spinners later in the match, particularly if rain delays persist." - Indian Express

The match is shaping up to be a thrilling contest as both teams showcase their strengths, with the series evenly poised.

item.title: WPL 2025 Auction: Live updates, player & squad lists - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
WPL 2025 Auction: Live updates, player & squad lists

Updated: 2024-12-15 • Source: ESPNcricinfo

Overview of the WPL 2025 auction highlights significant transactions, including a record sale of uncapped players.

  • Gujarat Giants were most active in the auction.
  • A total of 19 players sold for INR 9.05 crore.
  • Notable big buys included Simran Shaikh (INR 1.90 crore) and Deandra Dottin (INR 1.70 crore).
  • No capped Indian player was sold during the auction.
  • Full lists of players and squads are available on the ESPNcricinfo website.
"We were targeting Deandra Dottin and Simran Shaikh. They bring in power and batting at a high strike rate." - Michael Klinger, Gujarat Giants Coach

In conclusion, the WPL 2025 auction has reshaped the squads with remarkable bids for uncapped players, reflecting a shift in the franchise strategies for the upcoming season.

item.title: Craving Sweets? Try Saumya Tandon's Healthy Sweet Potato Halwa Recipe For A Guilt-Free Indulgence - News18
item.description:
Craving Sweets? Try Saumya Tandon's Healthy Sweet Potato Halwa Recipe For A Guilt-Free Indulgence

Date: December 15, 2024

Source: News18

Saumya Tandon shares her journey of quitting sugar and its substitutes for four years and presents a healthy sweet potato halwa recipe as a guilt-free dessert option.

  • Saumya Tandon is known for her role in "Bhabhi Ji Ghar Par Hai" and adheres to a strict fitness and diet regimen.
  • She eliminated all sugar and its substitutes, focusing only on naturally sweet foods.
  • Tandon describes her experience as a 'game changer' and encourages others to try desserts without sugar.
  • The recipe for sweet potato halwa uses ghee, milk, and optional nuts for flavor and nutrition.
“I gave up sugar /all sugar substitutes, honey and jaggery 4 years ago. I only eat fruits and dry fruits and desserts made of them. It’s a game changer. Try! Will keep posting desserts without using sugar/honey/jaggery and make you all believe we can eat sweet without sugar too.” - Saumya Tandon

This sweet potato halwa recipe presents a healthy alternative for dessert lovers looking for guilt-free indulgence while maintaining their dietary goals.

item.title: WPL 2025 mini auction Live updates: Deandra Dottin joins Gujarat Giants for 1.7 crores - Hindustan Times
item.description:
WPL Auction Highlights: Gujarat break the bank for Simran, Dottin; Sneh Rana goes unsold

Publication Date: December 15, 2024   |   Source: Hindustan Times

The WPL Auction took place in Bengaluru, where significant player purchases were made, including Simran Shaikh and Deandra Dottin by Gujarat Giants for ₹1.9 and ₹1.7 Crores respectively, while veteran Sneh Rana went unsold.

  • Gujarat Giants made the biggest splashes, acquiring Simran Shaikh for ₹1.9 Crores and Deandra Dottin for ₹1.7 Crores.
  • A total of 120 players were up for auction, with only a fraction expected to be sold.
  • Other notable purchases include G Kamalini by Mumbai Indians for ₹1.6 Crores and Prema Rawat by Royal Challengers Bengaluru for ₹1.2 Crores.
  • Several players went unsold including Sneh Rana, highlighting the unpredictability of the auction.
“Simran is the most expensive buy in this auction with GG spending 1.9 Cr on her.”

The auction showcased a mix of high-profile transactions and surprises, with teams aiming to strengthen their squads ahead of the league season.

item.title: Paracetamol poses gastrointestinal, cardiovascular, and renal risks for seniors: Study - The Times of India
item.description:
Paracetamol poses gastrointestinal, cardiovascular, and renal risks for seniors: Study

Publication Date: Not provided | Source: Not provided

A new study from the University of Nottingham highlights the potential risks of repeated paracetamol use in individuals aged 65 and older, linking it to serious gastrointestinal, cardiovascular, and renal complications.

  • The study analyzed health records of 180,483 seniors over a 20-year period.
  • Repeated paracetamol usage (≥2 prescriptions within six months) was associated with increased risks of peptic ulcers, heart failure, hypertension, and chronic kidney disease.
  • Paracetamol, traditionally seen as a safe pain reliever, can cause liver toxicity, especially in older adults.
  • The findings were published in the journal Arthritis Care and Research.
"Due to its perceived safety, paracetamol has long been recommended as the first line drug treatment for osteoarthritis by many treatment guidelines, especially in older people who are at higher risk of drug-related complications." - Professor Weiya Zhang

This study raises critical questions about the safety of long-term paracetamol use in older adults, urging a reevaluation of treatment guidelines.

item.title: ‘My political career made, unmade by Gandhis’, says Congress veteran Mani Shankar Aiyar - Hindustan Times
item.description:
‘My political career made, unmade by Gandhis’, says Congress veteran Mani Shankar Aiyar

Date: Dec 15, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Senior Congress leader Mani Shankar Aiyar has expressed that his political career has been significantly influenced by the Gandhi family, both positively and negatively, and has offered insights on the party's leadership decisions over the years.

  • Aiyar claims his political career was “made and unmade” by the Gandhi family.
  • He stated that he had limited personal interactions with Sonia Gandhi, Rahul Gandhi, and Priyanka Gandhi.
  • Aiyar believes if Pranab Mukherjee had become Prime Minister in 2012, the Congress would have performed better in the 2014 elections.
  • He recalled feeling surprised when Sonia Gandhi remarked, "I’m not a Christian" during a Christmas greeting.
  • Aiyar's upcoming book 'A Maverick in Politics' discusses these political dynamics and his experiences.
“The irony of my life is that my political career was made by the Gandhis and unmade by the Gandhis.”

In conclusion, Aiyar reflects on his complex relationship with the Gandhi family while emphasizing the pivotal role of Pranab Mukherjee's potential leadership in Congress's political fortunes.
